featureDesc: DataPrep is mainly designed for notebook users. The computation is fast. The output is interactive and shareable.

featureSubtitle: Get Things Done in a Few Lines of Code
featureDesc: DataPrep provides high level APIs that are easy to use and easy to remember. Write a few lines of code to start the data preparation!
DataPrep is build in Python. It can be seamlessly integrated with other Python libraries.
DataPrep is open sourced and follows MIT licenses. You could use it free for any application!
